examples: I fulfilled my instructions even as I had promised.
You are leaving tonight? — Even so.
This is my commandment, that ye love one another, even as I have loved you.

definitions.definition: In reality; implying an extreme example in the case mentioned, as compared to the implied reality.
examples: Even a blind squirrel finds an acorn sometimes.
Did you even make it through the front door?
That was before I was even born.
I was strong before, but now I am even stronger.

definitions.definition: Signalling a correction of one's previous utterance ; rather , that is .
examples: My favorite actor is Jack Nicklaus. Jack Nicholson, even .

secondary_definitions: In reality; implying an extreme example in the case mentioned, as compared to the implied reality.
Signalling a correction of one's previous utterance ; rather , that is .
